trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Millicent, Restless Revenant
trans-unit.target: 不息复灵米蕾森

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个精怪，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的精怪死去或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个1/1白色， 具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strefan, Maurer Progenitor
trans-unit.target: 茂威原祖史崔凡

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每有一位本回合中失去过生命的牌手，便派出一个血滴衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当史崔凡攻击时，你可以牺牲两个血滴衍生物。若你如此作，则你可以将一张吸血鬼牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。它获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Donal, Herald of Wings
trans-unit.target: 羽翼传令使唐诺

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放具飞行异能的非传奇生物咒语时，你可以复制之，但该复制品是1/1精怪，且仍具有原本类别。每回合只能如此作一次。（所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He sees a flicker of Avacyn's grace in every wingbeat.
trans-unit.target: 他在翅翼扇动间得见艾维欣光辉。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·4 | Timothar, Baron of Bats | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Timothar, Baron of Bats
trans-unit.target: 血蝠男爵提默沙

trans-unit.resname: VOC·4 | Timothar, Baron of Bats | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward—\nDiscard a card.\nWhenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张牌。\n每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的吸血鬼死去时，你可以支付{1}并将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的蝙蝠衍生生物。它获得「当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将它牺牲，并将所放逐之牌横置移回战场。」

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drogskol Reinforcements
trans-unit.target: 卓兹克援军

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
trans-unit.target: 乱斗（每当此生物攻击时，本次战斗中每有一位受你攻击的对手，此生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other Spirits you control have melee.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他精怪具有乱斗异能。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.
trans-unit.target: 防止将对由你操控的精怪造成的所有非战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haunted Library
trans-unit.target: 闹鬼图书馆

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The library of Moormanor had been open to all before the Travails, and it continues to attract curious visitors.
trans-unit.target: 在癫狂劫之前，荒邸图书馆原本就向公众开放，而今仍能引来好奇的访客。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of the Blessed Graf
trans-unit.target: 受福墓地僧侣

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，派出X个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物，X为操控之地比你多的对手数量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The honored dead who lie in blessed grafs are not easily stirred, but the threat of eternal night called many from their rest.
trans-unit.target: 得获光荣厚葬在受福墓地的逝者不会轻易遭到惊扰，但永夜的威胁让他们受托再起。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhoda, Geist Avenger
trans-unit.target: 携魂复仇者洛妲

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与年幼游魂提敏拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将提敏从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物成为横置时，若它并非于将其宣告为攻击者时而如此，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Storm of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂风暴

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们为具飞行异能的1/1精怪，且仍具有原本类别。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Devotion does not end with death.
trans-unit.target: 奉献不以死亡而告终。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·10 | Sudden Salvation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sudden Salvation
trans-unit.target: 突获救助

trans-unit.resname: VOC·10 | Sudden Salvation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.
trans-unit.target: 选择至多三张目标在坟墓场中的永久物牌，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者。将它们在各自拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。每有一位操控一个或更多此类永久物的对手，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breath of the Sleepless
trans-unit.target: 无眠者寒息

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将精怪咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你在对手的回合中施放生物咒语时，横置至多一个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Worse than the obscuring mists are the ghastly faces that appear in the glow of spectral lanterns.
trans-unit.target: 比遮天迷雾更糟糕的，莫过于街灯幽光下显现的可怖亡颜。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ethereal Investigator
trans-unit.target: 虚相调查员

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，探查X次，X为你的对手数量。（探查的流程是派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·13 | Haunting Imitation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haunting Imitation
trans-unit.target: 幽冥模仿

trans-unit.resname: VOC·13 | Haunting Imitation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。对以法此展示的每张生物牌而言，你派出一个为该牌之复制品的衍生物，但它是1/1，额外具有精怪此类别，且具有飞行异能。如果未以此法展示出生物牌，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Occult Epiphany
trans-unit.target: 秘学顿悟

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 抓X张牌，然后弃X张牌。以此法弃掉的牌中每有一种牌张类别，便派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In a single unending moment, a hundred lifetimes of knowledge coursed through his unraveling mind.
trans-unit.target: 在那一瞬无尽时刻，他思绪动荡跳跃，仿佛有整整一百辈子的知识奔流其间。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spectral Arcanist
trans-unit.target: 幽灵奥术师

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of Spirits you control from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从任一坟墓场中施放一个法术力值等于或小于由你操控之精怪数量的瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Timin, Youthful Geist
trans-unit.target: 年幼游魂提敏

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Rhoda, Geist Avenger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Rhoda into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与携魂复仇者洛妲拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将洛妲从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, tap up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，横置至多一个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crossway Troublemakers
trans-unit.target: 大道惹祸徒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的吸血鬼具有死触与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的吸血鬼死去时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Lady Anje said no violence at the wedding. She never said anything about the journey there!"
trans-unit.target: 「安姬大人不许我们在婚宴上动粗。但赴宴的路上可没有任何指示！」

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glass-Cast Heart
trans-unit.target: 琉璃心像

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控的吸血鬼攻击时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，支付1点生命：派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}{B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME和十三个血滴衍生物：每位对手各失去13点生命且你获得13点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kamber, the Plunderer
trans-unit.target: 劫掠者康芭

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Laurine, the Diversion (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Laurine into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与诱敌手劳琳拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将劳琳从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，你获得1点生命并派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Olivia's Wrath
trans-unit.target: 奥莉薇亚之怒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
trans-unit.target: 所有非吸血鬼生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的吸血鬼数量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them."\n—Olivia Voldaren
trans-unit.target: 「这些无用畜牲妄想溜进我的婚礼？解决他们。」\n～奥莉薇亚沃达连

trans-unit.resname: VOC·21 | Predators' Hour | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Predators' Hour
trans-unit.target: 掠食时刻

trans-unit.resname: VOC·21 | Predators' Hour | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得威慑与「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，牌面朝下地放逐该牌手的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并使用该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。」

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadowgrange Archfiend
trans-unit.target: 影庄大邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物，且须是由其操控的生物中力量最大者。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法牺牲之生物中的最大力量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Madness—{2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 疯魔～{2}{B}，支付8点生命。（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arterial Alchemy
trans-unit.target: 点血成金

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Blood token for each opponent you have. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你每有一位对手，便派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blood tokens you control are Equipment in addition to their other types and have "Equipped creature gets +2/+0" and equip {2}.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的血滴衍生物额外具有武具此类别，且具有「佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0」与佩带{2}。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·24 | Imposing Grandeur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imposing Grandeur
trans-unit.target: 威风凛凛

trans-unit.resname: VOC·24 | Imposing Grandeur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各可以进行以下流程～弃掉其手牌并抓若干牌，其数量等同于战场上或统帅区中由其拥有之指挥官间的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·74 | Scattered Thoughts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scattered Thoughts
trans-unit.target: 星散思绪

trans-unit.resname: VOW·74 | Scattered Thoughts | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·74 | Scattered Thoughts | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Stitchers delegate the most important tasks to assistants with a good eye for detail.
trans-unit.target: 拼接师手上最重要的事情，都会交办给最眼尖的助手。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·75 | Screaming Swarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Screaming Swarm
trans-unit.target: 尖鸣妖群

trans-unit.resname: VOW·75 | Screaming Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·75 | Screaming Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with one or more creatures, target player mills that many cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你以一个或数个生物攻击时，目标牌手磨等量的牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·75 | Screaming Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Put CARDNAME from your graveyard into your library second from the top.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置于你牌库顶数来第二张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·76 | Selhoff Entomber | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Selhoff Entomber
trans-unit.target: 塞贺入土妖

trans-unit.resname: VOW·76 | Selhoff Entomber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，弃一张生物牌：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·76 | Selhoff Entomber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It knows one fundamental truth: bodies belong in graves.
trans-unit.target: 它知道一个基本真理：尸身该留在墓地里。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·77 | Serpentine Ambush | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Serpentine Ambush
trans-unit.target: 蛇身伏击

trans-unit.resname: VOW·77 | Serpentine Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物成为基础力量与防御力为5/5的蓝色巨蛇。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·77 | Serpentine Ambush | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The merchant did guarantee the new bait would bring in something big.
trans-unit.target: 鱼饵商人确实保证这种新饵能钓上来大东西。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·78 | Skywarp Skaab | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skywarp Skaab
trans-unit.target: 跃空尸嵌

trans-unit.resname: VOW·78 | Skywarp Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·78 | Skywarp Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的坟墓场放逐两张生物牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·78 | Skywarp Skaab | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If I wanted all the parts to match, I wouldn't have become a stitcher."\n—Barton, stitcher
trans-unit.target: 「如果我坚持所有部位都能对上，我就不只是拼接师了。」\n～拼接师巴顿

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Soulcipher Board | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soulcipher Board
trans-unit.target: 密魂谜板

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Soulcipher Board | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three omen counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个预兆指示物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Soulcipher Board | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Soulcipher Board | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, remove an omen counter from CARDNAME. Then if it has no omen counters on it, transform it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，从CARDNAME上移去一个预兆指示物。然后若其上没有预兆指示物，则转化它。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Cipherbound Spirit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cipherbound Spirit
trans-unit.target: 缚密精怪

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Cipherbound Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Cipherbound Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Cipherbound Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·79 | Cipherbound Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rather than consort with demons, the Quietus Cult seeks wisdom from the dead.
trans-unit.target: 偿生教派不再崇拜恶魔，而是转向死者寻求智慧。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·80 | Steelclad Spirit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steelclad Spirit
trans-unit.target: 覆铁精怪

trans-unit.resname: VOW·80 | Steelclad Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.resname: VOW·80 | Steelclad Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME于本回合中能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·80 | Steelclad Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some geists imitate the lives they left behind. Others follow the dreams they never realized.
trans-unit.target: 有些游魂会模仿旧有习惯继续生活。而有些就大胆追求从未实现的梦想。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·81 | Stitched Assistant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stitched Assistant
trans-unit.target: 缝组助手

trans-unit.resname: VOW·81 | Stitched Assistant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·81 | Stitched Assistant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME exploits a creature, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME榨取生物时，占卜1，然后抓一张牌。（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·82 | Stormchaser Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stormchaser Drake
trans-unit.target: 逐风龙兽

trans-unit.resname: VOW·82 | Stormchaser Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·82 | Stormchaser Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell you control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为由你操控之咒语的目标时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·82 | Stormchaser Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Blasted drake's interfering with the conductivity again. Garl! Go chase it away."\n—Ludevic, necro-alchemist
trans-unit.target: 「讨厌的龙兽又来干扰电流通导了。嘎耳！快去把它赶跑。」\n～死灵炼金术士卢德维

trans-unit.resname: VOW·83 | Syncopate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syncopate
trans-unit.target: 切分

trans-unit.resname: VOW·83 | Syncopate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{X}，否则反击之。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·83 | Syncopate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fool! Can't you see the tide has turned against you?"
trans-unit.target: 「蠢货！你没看到浪潮已经逆转了吗？」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·84 | Syphon Essence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syphon Essence
trans-unit.target: 吸收菁华

trans-unit.resname: VOW·84 | Syphon Essence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物或鹏洛客咒语。派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·84 | Syphon Essence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.
trans-unit.target: 制造尸嵌的第三步，需要将尸体内的血液抽干，换用天使鲜血与提灯灯油混合而成的*生命精华*灌注其中。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·85 | Thirst for Discovery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thirst for Discovery
trans-unit.target: 渴求发现

trans-unit.resname: VOW·85 | Thirst for Discovery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a basic land card.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。然后除非你弃一张基本地牌，否则弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·85 | Thirst for Discovery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is your only warning, alchemist. The secrets of the sea are not yours to behold. Lord Krothuss will not be so merciful next time."\n—Runo Stromkirk
trans-unit.target: 「炼金术士，我只警告一次。切莫妄自探寻大海的秘密。我主寇瑟斯下次就不会这么客气了。」\n～卢诺溪堡

trans-unit.resname: VOW·86 | Wanderlight Spirit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wanderlight Spirit
trans-unit.target: 游灯精怪

trans-unit.resname: VOW·86 | Wanderlight Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·86 | Wanderlight Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·86 | Wanderlight Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The towers and catwalks of the Voldaren fortress are lit by the lanterns of geists endlessly seeking a way out.
trans-unit.target: 困于沃达连堡中的无数游魂不断找寻出路，手中提灯照亮了要塞中每一处高塔与步道。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·87 | Wash Away | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wash Away
trans-unit.target: 全数冲尽

trans-unit.resname: VOW·87 | Wash Away | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cleave {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
trans-unit.target: 贯通{1}{U}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的叙述。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·87 | Wash Away | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell [that wasn't cast from its owner's hand].
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语［，且该咒语须未从其拥有者手上施放］。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·87 | Wash Away | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May the ocean take it"\n—Nephalia expression meaning\n"good riddance"
trans-unit.target: 「愿海洋将它带走」\n～涅非利亚用语，意指\n「终得解脱」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·88 | Whispering Wizard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Whispering Wizard
trans-unit.target: 细语法师

trans-unit.resname: VOW·88 | Whispering Wizard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·88 | Whispering Wizard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ivold was aghast when his device revealed the full scope of the geist infestation.
trans-unit.target: 透过自己仪器观察到的游魂侵扰全貌，让伊沃德大为震惊。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·89 | Winged Portent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Winged Portent
trans-unit.target: 翼展征兆

trans-unit.resname: VOW·89 | Winged Portent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cleave {4}{G}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
trans-unit.target: 贯通{4}{G}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的叙述。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·89 | Winged Portent | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each creature [with flying] you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个［具飞行异能的］生物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·89 | Winged Portent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No, no, it's just a murder of crows, not an omen of murder . . . I think."\n—York, Kessig tracker
trans-unit.target: 「不是，不是，这应该只是骇人鸦群，不是害命征兆…应该。」\n～凯锡革追迹人约克

trans-unit.resname: VOW·90 | Witness the Future | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Witness the Future
trans-unit.target: 亲睹未来

trans-unit.resname: VOW·90 | Witness the Future | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from their graveyard into their library. You look at the top four cards of your library, then put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将至多四张目标牌从其坟墓场洗入其牌库。你检视你牌库顶的四张牌，然后将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·91 | Wretched Throng | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wretched Throng
trans-unit.target: 污劣大群

trans-unit.resname: VOW·91 | Wretched Throng | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may search your library for a card named CARDNAME, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张名称为CARDNAME的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·91 | Wretched Throng | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Oh no, again!"\n—Beltstad, cathar recruit, last words
trans-unit.target: 「糟了。糟了。糟了。糟了，还来啊！」\n～护教军新兵贝兹德的遗言

trans-unit.resname: VOW·92 | Aim for the Head | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aim for the Head
trans-unit.target: 瞄准头部

trans-unit.resname: VOW·92 | Aim for the Head | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: VOW·92 | Aim for the Head | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Exile target Zombie.
trans-unit.target: •放逐目标灵俑。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·92 | Aim for the Head | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
trans-unit.target: •目标对手从其手上放逐两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·92 | Aim for the Head | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Works every time."\n—Halana, Kessig ranger
trans-unit.target: 「次次见效。」\n～凯锡革护林者荷拉娜

trans-unit.resname: VOW·93 | Archghoul of Thraben | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archghoul of Thraben
trans-unit.target: 瑟班大尸鬼

trans-unit.resname: VOW·93 | Archghoul of Thraben | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Zombie you control dies, look at the top card of your library. If it's a Zombie card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的灵俑死去时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若它是灵俑牌，则你可以展示该牌并将它置于你手上。若你未将该牌置于你手上，则你可以将它置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·94 | Bleed Dry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bleed Dry
trans-unit.target: 榨干

trans-unit.resname: VOW·94 | Bleed Dry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得-13/-13。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·94 | Bleed Dry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wipe your chin, child. We can't have Olivia thinking we're uncivilized."\n—Anje Falkenrath
trans-unit.target: 「把嘴巴擦干净，孩子。可不能让奥莉薇亚觉得我们没教养。」\n～安姬伐肯纳

trans-unit.resname: VOW·95 | Blood Fountain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Fountain
trans-unit.target: 融血喷泉

trans-unit.resname: VOW·95 | Blood Fountain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·95 | Blood Fountain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·96 | Bloodcrazed Socialite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodcrazed Socialite
trans-unit.target: 血狂名流

trans-unit.resname: VOW·96 | Bloodcrazed Socialite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: VOW·96 | Bloodcrazed Socialite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·96 | Bloodcrazed Socialite | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲一个血滴衍生物。若你如此作，则它得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·97 | Bloodsworn Squire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodsworn Squire
trans-unit.target: 血誓扈从

trans-unit.resname: VOW·97 | Bloodsworn Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Discard a card: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. Then if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, transform CARDNAME. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，弃一张牌：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。将它横置。然后如果你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则转化CARDNAME。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·97 | Bloodsworn Knight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodsworn Knight
trans-unit.target: 血誓骑士

trans-unit.resname: VOW·97 | Bloodsworn Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·97 | Bloodsworn Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Discard a card: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，弃一张牌：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。将它横置。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·98 | Bloodvial Purveyor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodvial Purveyor
trans-unit.target: 血瓶贩商

trans-unit.resname: VOW·98 | Bloodvial Purveyor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: VOW·98 | Bloodvial Purveyor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player creates a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，该牌手派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·98 | Bloodvial Purveyor | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，防御牌手每操控一个血滴衍生物，它便得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·99 | Catapult Fodder | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: VOW·99 | Catapult Fodder | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控三个或更多防御力比力量大的生物，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·99 | Catapult Fodder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: These days, ghouls are the only abundant resource in Thraben.
trans-unit.target: 这时节，瑟班还充足的东西就只有食尸鬼了。

trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：目标对手失去若干生命，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·99 | Catapult Captain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: And they're more than happy to share the wealth.
trans-unit.target: 而它们也非常乐于与他人分享富足。

trans-unit.source: "Do not try to negotiate with me, human. You want power? This is the price."\n—Ormendahl

trans-unit.resname: VOW·120 | Hero's Downfall | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Odric resisted the vampire's curse with all his strength. But after a lifetime of fighting monsters, he was doomed to become one himself.
trans-unit.target: 欧吉克倾尽全力想要抵御吸血鬼的诅咒。但在与怪物缠斗一生之后，自己注定也要成为怪物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Innocent Traveler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Innocent Traveler
trans-unit.target: 无辜旅人

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Innocent Traveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If no one does, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，任意对手可以牺牲一个生物。若无人如此作，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Innocent Traveler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Aren't you going to invite me in?"
trans-unit.target: 「您不打算请我进去吗？」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Malicious Invader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Malicious Invader
trans-unit.target: 恶毒侵客

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Malicious Invader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Malicious Invader | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +2/+0 as long as an opponent controls a Human.
trans-unit.target: 只要任一对手操控人类，CARDNAME便得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·121 | Malicious Invader | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Aren't you going to offer me a drink?"
trans-unit.target: 「您不打算请我喝点什么吗？」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·122 | Mindleech Ghoul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mindleech Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 夺念食尸鬼

trans-unit.resname: VOW·122 | Mindleech Ghoul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·122 | Mindleech Ghoul | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME exploits a creature, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME榨取生物时，每位对手各从其手上放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·122 | Mindleech Ghoul | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This still doesn't make you the brains of the operation."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「就算这样你也没办法成为行动首脑。」\n～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: VOW·123 | Parasitic Grasp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Parasitic Grasp
trans-unit.target: 寄生之攫

trans-unit.resname: VOW·123 | Parasitic Grasp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cleave {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
trans-unit.target: 贯通{1}{B}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的叙述。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·123 | Parasitic Grasp | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target [Human] creature. You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标［人类］生物造成3点伤害。你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·123 | Parasitic Grasp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some wicked souls linger only to consume the warmth of life.
trans-unit.target: 有些邪恶灵魂徘徊世间，只是为了贪图生机暖意。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·124 | Path of Peril | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Path of Peril
trans-unit.target: 险峻路途

trans-unit.resname: VOW·124 | Path of Peril | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cleave {4}{W}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
trans-unit.target: 贯通{4}{W}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的叙述。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·124 | Path of Peril | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures [with mana value 2 or less].
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有［法术力值等于或小于2的］生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·124 | Path of Peril | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To Olivia's guests, a welcome. To everyone else, a warning.
trans-unit.target: 对奥莉薇亚的宾客而言，这是欢迎之路。对所有其他人来说，则是警告之途。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·125 | Persistent Specimen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Persistent Specimen
trans-unit.target: 复组标本

trans-unit.resname: VOW·125 | Persistent Specimen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·125 | Persistent Specimen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The jaw bone's connected to the skull bone. The skull bone's connected to the . . . uh . . . hook thingy."\n—Garl, sticher's assistant
trans-unit.target: 「腭骨接在头骨上。头骨接在…呃…接在那像钩子的东西上。」\n～拼接师助手嘎耳

trans-unit.resname: VOW·126 | Pointed Discussion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pointed Discussion
trans-unit.target: 针锋相对

trans-unit.resname: VOW·126 | Pointed Discussion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 你抓两张牌，失去两点生命，然后派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·126 | Pointed Discussion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Small talk is a dying art.
trans-unit.target: 闲谈渐成失传技艺。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Ragged Recluse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ragged Recluse
trans-unit.target: 褴褛隐士

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Ragged Recluse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you discarded a card this turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中弃过牌，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Ragged Recluse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Forgive my manners. It's been so long since I had a guest for dinner."
trans-unit.target: 「请恕我招待不周。我已经很久没有留客人一起用餐了。」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Odious Witch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Odious Witch
trans-unit.target: 可憎巫婆

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Odious Witch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，防御牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·127 | Odious Witch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her cauldron refilled, she settled in to wait for the next unsuspecting traveler to knock at her door.
trans-unit.target: 就这样，她把锅再度装满，又坐回椅子上，静待下一位毫无戒心的旅人敲开房门。

trans-unit.source: Restless Bloodseeker
trans-unit.target: 无休觅血客

trans-unit.resname: VOW·128 | Restless Bloodseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过生命，则派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·128 | Restless Bloodseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice two Blood tokens: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲两个血滴衍生物：转化CARDNAME。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·128 | Bloodsoaked Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过生命，则派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

trans-unit.resname: VOW·129 | Rot-Tide Gargantua | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Now that it doesn't need to breathe, its hunting ground extends well beyond the sea.
trans-unit.target: 既然现在再也不用呼吸，它的狩猎地盘就已超越海洋。

trans-unit.target: 隐匿杀手

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择目标由对手操控的生物。如果该对手未操控其他生物，则该生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·130 | Skulking Killer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Olivia set a few villagers loose in the hedge maze as part of the evening's "entertainment."
trans-unit.target: 奥莉薇亚让几位村民在树篱迷宫中自由活动，当作傍晚的「余兴活动」。

trans-unit.source: [+1]: Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card and put it into your hand. If you do, you lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你的牌库顶牌。你可以展示该牌并将它置于你手上。如果你如此作，则你失去等同于其法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·131 | Sorin the Mirthless | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: −2：派出一个2/3黑色，具飞行与系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: [−7]: CARDNAME deals 13 damage to any target. You gain 13 life.
trans-unit.target: −7：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成13点伤害。你获得13点生命。

trans-unit.source: Toxrill, the Corrosive
trans-unit.target: 腐蚀蝓怪陀袭力

trans-unit.resname: VOW·132 | Toxrill, the Corrosive | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, put a slime counter on each creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，在每个不由你操控的生物上各放置一个黏菌指示物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·132 | Toxrill, the Corrosive | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 for each slime counter on them.
trans-unit.target: 对每个不由你操控的生物而言，其上每有一个黏菌指示物，它便得-1/-1。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·132 | Toxrill, the Corrosive | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you don't control with a slime counter on it dies, create a 1/1 black Slug creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个不由你操控且其上有黏菌指示物的生物死去时，你派出一个1/1黑色蛞蝓衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·132 | Toxrill, the Corrosive | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: {U}{B}, Sacrifice a Slug: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {U}{B}，牺牲一个蛞蝓：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·133 | Undead Butler | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 不死管家

trans-unit.resname: VOW·133 | Undead Butler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。（将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·133 | Undead Butler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以将它放逐。当你如此作时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·134 | Undying Malice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undying Malice
trans-unit.target: 不息恶意

trans-unit.resname: VOW·134 | Undying Malice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物获得「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场，且上面有一个+1/+1指示物。」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·134 | Undying Malice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few take kindly to being put in their place, especially if their place is the grave.
trans-unit.target: 没人乐意被逼到绝地，特别是绝地就是墓地的时候。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·135 | Unhallowed Phalanx | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In case any of you new recruits were wondering, this is why we don't use mass graves anymore."\n—Kerren of the Mausoleum Guards
trans-unit.target: 「你们这些新人如果好奇过为什么不干脆把死人集体一埋了事的话，这就是答案。」\n～陵墓守卫珂伦

trans-unit.target: 目标牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。你派出两个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·136 | Vampire's Kiss | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Young vampires gorge themselves at every meal, but their elders have learned to savor the smallest bite.
trans-unit.target: 年轻吸血鬼每餐都狼吞虎咽，但其长者已学会了每口都啜吸细品。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·137 | Voldaren Bloodcaster | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当你派出一个血滴衍生物时，若你操控五个或更多血滴衍生物，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，至多一个目标由你操控的血滴衍生物成为2/2黑色，具飞行与敏捷异能的蝙蝠生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·137 | Bloodbat Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Humans throw rice and release doves at their weddings? How quaint."
trans-unit.target: 「人类婚礼上会撒米粒、放白鸽？真奇怪。」

trans-unit.resname: VOW·138 | Wedding Security | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: VOW·138 | Wedding Security | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲一个血滴衍生物。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物并抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·138 | Wedding Security | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In lieu of payment, he was granted permission to devour any unauthorized visitors.
trans-unit.target: 这份工作虽没有实质报酬，但他有权吞食一切擅闯访客。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·141 | Deadly Dancer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When this creature transforms into CARDNAME, add {R}{R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·164 | Kessig Flamebreather | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hunter's fire" was meant for slaying monsters in the Ulvenwald, but that never stopped Ralen from showing it off.
trans-unit.target: 本来「猎人秘火」是用来在沃文森内杀戮怪物用的，但拉仁总忍不住要四处炫耀。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·165 | Kessig Wolfrider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}, {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Create a 3/2 red Wolf creature token.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}，{T}，从你的坟墓场放逐三张牌：派出一个3/2红色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·165 | Kessig Wolfrider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's a perfect partnership. My village is safe from wolf attacks, and she gets to eat any vampires we catch."
trans-unit.target: 「我们的合作堪称完美。这样一来我的村庄就可以免遭狼群袭击，而她也能尽情享用我们逮到的吸血鬼。」

trans-unit.source: If damage would be dealt to CARDNAME while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it. When one or more counters are removed from CARDNAME this way, it deals that much damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME于其上有+1/+1指示物时将受到伤害，则防止该伤害，并从其上移去等量的+1/+1指示物。当以此法从CARDNAME上移去一个或数个指示物时，它对任意一个目标造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·175 | Rending Flame | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It is our duty to bring the Blessed Sleep to the dead, even if they resist that gift."\n—Grete, Order of Saint Traft
trans-unit.target: 「我们的职责是确保死者得享受福安眠，就算对方拒绝亦然。」\n～圣沙弗骑士团的葛俐

trans-unit.resname: VOW·207 | Laid to Rest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Laid to Rest
trans-unit.target: 终得安息

trans-unit.resname: VOW·207 | Laid to Rest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Human you control dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的人类死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·207 | Laid to Rest | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物死去时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·207 | Laid to Rest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We are not here to mourn their loss. We are here to celebrate their lives."\n—Vesna, Dawnhart witch
trans-unit.target: 「我们集聚于此，并非悲悼生命离逝。我们集聚于此，是为追念灿烂往生。」\n～曙鹿集女巫文斯娜

trans-unit.resname: VOW·208 | Massive Might | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Massive Might
trans-unit.target: 力量陡增

trans-unit.resname: VOW·208 | Massive Might | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: VOW·209 | Moldgraf Millipede | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each creature card in your graveyard. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌，然后你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·209 | Moldgraf Millipede | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Between stitchers, cultists, and scavengers, corpses are in high demand.
trans-unit.target: 拼接师、教众、食腐兽，在多方争抢下，如今尸体需求旺盛。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·210 | Mulch | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 护根

trans-unit.resname: VOW·210 | Mulch | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的四张牌。将以此法展示的所有地牌置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·210 | Mulch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tread carefully. You remember what happened in the last quiet, peaceful clearing."\n—Halana, to Alena
trans-unit.target: 「下脚时务必当心。上次也是一片看似安静祥和的空地，你没忘记后来怎样了吧。」\n～荷拉娜告诫阿雷娜

trans-unit.target: 榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·248 | Skull Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control exploits a nontoken creature, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物榨取非衍生物的生物时，派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·249 | Torens, Fist of the Angels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torens, Fist of the Angels
trans-unit.target: 天使之拳托亨斯

trans-unit.resname: VOW·249 | Torens, Fist of the Angels | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
trans-unit.target: 见习（每当此生物与另一个力量较之为大的生物一起攻击时，在前者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·249 | Torens, Fist of the Angels | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 green and white Human Soldier creature token with training.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，派出一个1/1，绿白双色，具见习异能的人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·250 | Vilespawn Spider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vilespawn Spider
trans-unit.target: 孽恶蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: VOW·250 | Vilespawn Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach
trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: VOW·250 | Vilespawn Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，磨一张牌。（将你牌库顶的一张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·250 | Vilespawn Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}{U}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，便派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·251 | Wandering Mind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wandering Mind
trans-unit.target: 游荡灵妖

trans-unit.resname: VOW·251 | Wandering Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOW·251 | Wandering Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张非生物且非地的牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·252 | Blood Servitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Servitor
trans-unit.target: 鲜血侍从

trans-unit.resname: VOW·252 | Blood Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·252 | Blood Servitor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Please, my friends, help yourselves to the help."\n—Olivia Voldaren
trans-unit.target: 「朋友们，不必客气，一切都可在服务台自取。」\n～奥莉薇亚沃达连

trans-unit.resname: VOW·253 | Boarded Window | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boarded Window
trans-unit.target: 钉板窗户

trans-unit.resname: VOW·253 | Boarded Window | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures attacking you get -1/-0.
trans-unit.target: 向你进行攻击的生物得-1/-0。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·253 | Boarded Window | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if you were dealt 4 or more damage this turn, exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中受过4点或更多伤害，则放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·253 | Boarded Window | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sturdy nails make for sound sleep."\n—Cosper Lowe of the Silbern Guard
trans-unit.target: 「钉得越牢，睡得越熟。」\n～席尔本卫队的考伯洛

trans-unit.target: 祭仪小刀

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, create a Blood token." (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+0且具有「每当此生物造成战斗伤害时，派出一个血滴衍生物。」（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·254 | Ceremonial Knife | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}（{2}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.source: Dollhouse of Horrors
trans-unit.target: 恐怖玩具屋

trans-unit.resname: VOW·255 | Dollhouse of Horrors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card, except it's a 0/0 Construct artifact in addition to its other types and it has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each Construct you control." It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为所放逐之牌的复制品，但它是0/0组构体神器，仍具有原本类别，且具有「你每操控一个组构体，此生物便得+1/+1。」它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.target: 恶兆塑像

trans-unit.resname: VOW·256 | Foreboding Statue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Put an omen counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。在CARDNAME上放置一个预兆指示物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·256 | Foreboding Statue | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if there are three or more omen counters on CARDNAME, untap it, then transform it.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若CARDNAME上有三个或更多预兆指示物，则将它重置，然后转化它。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·256 | Foreboding Statue | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the sand eroded, a faint sound could be heard whirling under the ground.
trans-unit.target: 泥沙消退后，地下远远传来一阵机械运转声。

trans-unit.target: 遭弃挥扫械

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·256 | Forsaken Thresher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Were it not for the cultists' fatal curiosity, the terrible machine might have lain dormant for decades more.
trans-unit.target: 若不是教众过分好奇，这可怕机械可能还会继续沉眠地底。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·262 | Dreamroot Cascade | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 温馨细语吸引旅人靠近，靠近，再靠近…直到他们悄无声息地消失在水面之下。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·263 | Evolving Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Spend too much time scanning the shadows for evil and you'll never see the beauty our world has to offer."\n—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: VOW·307 | Olivia's Attendants | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, create that many Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME造成伤害时，派出等量的血滴衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·307 | Olivia's Attendants | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.target: 沃达连品血客

trans-unit.resname: VOW·308 | Voldaren Epicure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向每位对手各造成1点伤害。派出一个血滴衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·309 | Anje, Maid of Dishonor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anje, Maid of Dishonor
trans-unit.target: 邪气伴娘安姬

trans-unit.resname: VOW·309 | Anje, Maid of Dishonor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME and/or one or more other Vampires enter the battlefield under your control, create a Blood token. This ability triggers only once each turn. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME和／或一个或数个其他吸血鬼在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·309 | Anje, Maid of Dishonor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Sacrifice another creature or a Blood token: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {2}，牺牲另一个生物或一个血滴衍生物：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·310 | Bloodtithe Harvester | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodtithe Harvester
trans-unit.target: 血税收集官

trans-unit.resname: VOW·310 | Bloodtithe Harvester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个血滴衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·310 | Bloodtithe Harvester | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is twice the number of Blood tokens you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控之血滴衍生物数量的两倍。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他吸血鬼得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·311 | Edgar, Charmed Groom | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink and put a bloodline counter on CARDNAME. Then if there are three or more bloodline counters on it, remove those counters and transform it.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物，并在CARDNAME上放置一个血脉指示物。然后若其上有三个或更多血脉指示物，则移去这些指示物并转化它。

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过生命，则你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，至多两个目标由你操控的生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。

(Count each ability only once.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出X个血滴衍生物，X为见于由你操控的生物上之飞行、先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、践踏与警戒各异能的数量。（每种异能仅计算一次。）

trans-unit.resname: VOW·315 | Olivia, Crimson Bride | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains "When you don't control a legendary Vampire, exile this creature."
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场且正进行攻击。它获得「当你未操控传奇吸血鬼时，放逐此生物。」

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put up to one target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·316 | Runo Stromkirk | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If a creature card with mana value 6 or greater is revealed this way, transform CARDNAME.

trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后从你手上牌面朝下地放逐一张牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视它。你可以支付{4}{U}{U}。如果你如此作，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·320 | Hauken's Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视它。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·320 | Hauken's Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a spell from among the cards exiled with this permanent without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从以此永久物放逐的牌之中使用一个地或施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 拘禁牢环

trans-unit.resname: VOW·329 | Circle of Confinement | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控且法术力值等于或小于3的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·329 | Circle of Confinement | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a Vampire spell with the same name as a card exiled with CARDNAME, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当对手施放与以CARDNAME放逐之牌同名的吸血鬼咒语时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.target: 见习

trans-unit.resname: VOW·330 | Savior of Ollenbock | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME trains, exile up to one other target creature from the battlefield or creature card from a graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME见习时，选择至多另一个目标战场上的生物或坟墓场中的生物牌。将它从该处放逐。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·330 | Savior of Ollenbock | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, put the exiled cards onto the battlefield under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·331 | Thalia, Guardian of Thraben | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
trans-unit.target: 瑟班守护者莎利雅

trans-unit.source: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

trans-unit.resname: VOW·331 | Thalia, Guardian of Thraben | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our dear Madam Mina is once more our teacher. Her eyes have been where we were blinded. Now we are on the track once again, and this time we may succeed."
trans-unit.target: 「亲爱的米娜女士又一次点醒了我们。她的眼睛注意到了我们错失的地方。我们总算又回到正轨上，而这次就有可能成功。」

trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may pay {4}{U}{U}. If you do, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后从你手上牌面朝下地放逐一张牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视它。你可以支付{4}{U}{U}。如果你如此作，则转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·332 | Hauken's Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视它。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·332 | Hauken's Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a spell from among the cards exiled with this permanent without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从以此永久物放逐的牌之中使用一个地或施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 渴求发现

trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。然后除非你弃一张基本地牌，否则弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·333 | Thirst for Discovery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: I knew he had left the castle now, and thought to use the opportunity to explore more than I had dared to do as yet.
trans-unit.target: 我知道他已离开城堡，于是就打算借此机会来探索我此前未敢深入之处。

trans-unit.source: Nothing can be more dreadful than those awful women, who were—who are—waiting to suck my blood.

trans-unit.resname: VOW·336 | Innocent Traveler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: I looked at her throat just now as she lay asleep, and the tiny wounds seem not to have healed.
trans-unit.target: 我刚在她躺下睡去后检查了她的颈部，那两个小孔如今尚未愈合。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·336 | Malicious Invader | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 范海辛举起提灯并拉下灯罩；顺着照在露西脸上的灯光，我们清楚看到她嘴唇因沾有鲜血而分外红艳。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·339 | Vampires' Vengeance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She was ghastly, chalkily pale; the red seemed to have gone even from her lips and gums, and the bones of her face stood out prominently; her breathing was painful to see or hear.
trans-unit.target: 她面色惨白，甚至连嘴唇和牙龈都毫无血色，脸上颧骨高高突起，喘息样子令人目不忍视。

trans-unit.source: We want no proofs; we ask none to believe us! This boy will some day know what a brave and gallant woman his mother is.
trans-unit.target: 我们不需要证据，也不要求别人来相信我们！总有一天，这个孩子会知道他妈妈曾有多么无畏勇敢。

trans-unit.source: "It is in the hold, perhaps in one of those boxes. I'll unscrew them one by one and see. You work the helm."
trans-unit.target: 「他就在货舱，可能藏在哪个箱子里。我要把箱子一个个都拆开来瞧一瞧。你来掌舵。」

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Spirit. It also costs {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控精怪，则此咒语减少{1}来施放。如果你操控结界，则它也减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·405 | Geistlight Snare | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·405 | Geistlight Snare | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tamil had always wanted a closer look at a geist's lantern. Now he had an eternity to study one.
trans-unit.target: 塔迷尔一直都想仔细端详游魂的提灯。如今他有无穷尽的时间来好好研究。

trans-unit.source: Fell Stinger
trans-unit.target: 极恶刺蝎

trans-unit.resname: VOW·406 | Fell Stinger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: VOW·406 | Fell Stinger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 榨取

trans-unit.resname: VOW·406 | Fell Stinger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME exploits a creature, target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME榨取生物时，目标牌手抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·407 | Dominating Vampire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dominating Vampire
trans-unit.target: 控念吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: VOW·407 | Dominating Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Vampires you control until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择目标生物，且其法术力值须等于或小于由你操控的吸血鬼数量。获得该生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOW·407 | Dominating Vampire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You can join me or feed me. Choose fast."
trans-unit.target: 「你可以加入我或喂饱我。选快点。」
